statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info;
SELECT id, practice_name FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE impact_on_environment = 'Low';
SELECT description FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, practice_name, benefits_to_farmers FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE impact_on_environment = 'High';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info ORDER BY practice_name DESC
SELECT id, practice_name, impact_on_environment FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE id > 3
SELECT practice_name, description, benefits_to_farmers FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE impact_on_environment = 'Positive'
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE practice_name LIKE '%organic%'
SELECT practice_name, description FROM sustainable_farming_practices_info WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM sustainable_farming_practices;
SELECT id, practice_name, description FROM sustainable_farming_practices WHERE benefit='Increased yield';
SELECT * FROM farmers_information WHERE location='California';
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM farmers_information;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming_practices WHERE practice_name LIKE 'organic' ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT farmer_name, location, practice_name FROM farmers_information JOIN sustainable_farming_practices ON farmers_information.practice_id = sustainable_farming_practices.id WHERE sustainable_farming_practices.benefit = 'environmental';

SELECT farmer_name, practice_name FROM farmers_information JOIN sustainable_farming_practices ON farmers_information.practice_id = sustainable_farming_practices.id WHERE farmers_information.location = 'California' ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM sustainable_farming_practices WHERE id = 'd65a8106-0a02-4310-8356-749134e4f9d4' LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_farmers FROM farmers_information WHERE practice_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFarmingPractices;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM SustainableFarmingPractices;
SELECT practice_id, benefits FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE practice_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE practice_name = 'Crop Rotation';
SELECT practice_id, practice_name, description, benefits FROM SustainableFarmingPractices ORDER BY practice_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE practice_id = 1;
SELECT practice_name, benefits FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE practice_id > 2 ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE benefits IS NOT NULL;
SELECT practice_id, practice_name, description, benefits FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE description LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM SustainableFarmingPractices WHERE practice_name LIKE '%sustainable%' ORDER BY practice_id ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT farmer_name, sustainability_rating FROM Farmers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, practice_name FROM Farmers JOIN Farmer_Practices ON Farmers.farmer_id = Farmer_Practices.farmer_id JOIN Practices ON Farmer_Practices.practice_id = Practices.practice_id;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, sustainability_rating FROM Farmers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;

SELECT Farmers.farmer_name, Practices.practice_name FROM Farmers JOIN Farmer_Practices ON Farmers.farmer_id = Farmer_Practices.farmer_id JOIN Practices ON Farmer_Practices.practice_id = Practices.practice_id;

SELECT Farmers.farmer_name, Farmers.farm_location, Practices.practice_name FROM Farmers LEFT JOIN Farmer_Practices ON Farmers.farmer_id = Farmer_Practices.farmer_id LEFT JOIN Practices ON Farmer_Practices.practice_id = Practices.practice_id WHERE Practices.practice_name LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT name, location FROM farmers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, organization FROM policymakers ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT practice_id, rating FROM practice_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, name, description FROM practices JOIN farm_practices ON practices.id = farm_practices.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM practices ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, description FROM practices WHERE id > 3 AND id < 8;
SELECT f.name, p.name AS practice_name, pr.rating FROM farmers f JOIN practice_reviews pr ON f.id = pr.farmer_id JOIN practices p ON pr.practice_id = p.id WHERE pr.rating > 4 ORDER BY pr.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM policymakers WHERE organization = 'XYZ Inc.';

SELECT fp_id, f.name AS farmer_name, p.name AS practice_name FROM farm_practices fp JOIN farmers f ON fp.farm_id = f.id JOIN practices p ON fp.practice_id = p.id WHERE f.location = 'California' LIMIT 10;
